Articles.Content: This is an idea for a module like the mobile science lab, but it allows you to build parts in space if you have the right materials. It could be large and can build parts that are medium or lower inside the module. Parts, that are large or higher, must be decided where they are going to be before they can be built. This would also make it easier for space stations to be built over different planets.
So, the main feature of colony update?

1 hour ago, The Aziz said:

So, the main feature of colony update?

but for space stations

Same thing. "orbital vehicle construction" is mentioned in the same panel on the roadmap.

Which is essential if there's any chance of going interstellar later.
ok i did not see it. thank you
